about_the_game:
SCP: Distorted Spacetime is a thrilling horror game based on the SCP Wiki. In this game, you work in the dangerous world of Site-DE2 and can choose from various jobs such as Class D Personnel, Mobile Task Force Alpha 1, Omega 7, Epsilon 11, as well as O5 and Scientists. Each job has its own unique storyline and challenges to overcome.

Features


  • Choose Your Job: Players can choose from a variety of jobs each with their own unique skills and abilities.

  • Engaging Storylines: Each job comes with its own gripping storyline that will keep players on the edge of their seat.

  • Breach Mode: In this mode, players must try to escape or terminate the SCPs while playing as any of the available jobs.

  • Dynamic Gameplay: The gameplay is constantly changing, requiring players to adapt and think on their feet in order to survive.

  • Immersive World: The world of Site-DE2 is richly detailed, with atmospheric environments that will draw players into the game.

In SCP: Distorted Spacetime, players must navigate the dangerous world of Site-DE2, facing off against various SCPs and other hazards. Each job offers a unique perspective on the game, with different strengths and weaknesses that players must leverage to succeed. With its engaging storylines and dynamic gameplay, SCP: Distorted Spacetime is sure to keep players on the edge of their seat as they try to survive and uncover the secrets of Site-DE2.

So if you're a fan of horror games and looking for a thrilling new experience, be sure to check out SCP: Distorted Spacetime.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel I5 7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Rx 570 or Nvidia GTX 1080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: SCP: Distorted Spacetime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or Intel I5 7600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Rx 570 or Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
